data.prayer: Father, help the 19,907 believers in Faridabad to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Faridabad, Haryana, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Faridabad who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
the county of Faridabad has (about) 19,907 people who know Jesus, 21,958 people who know about him culturally, and 1,767,836 people who are far from Jesus.
Spirit, fill the 1,809,700 souls living in the county of Faridabad with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Jat Godara people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Faridabad, Haryana, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Faridabad are far from Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the county of Faridabad, Haryana, India has a population of 1,809,700.

We estimate Faridabad has 19,907 people who might know Jesus, 21,958 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,767,836 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 19,907 believers in Faridabad, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

location.name: Faridabad
location.people_groups_list: Jat Mahil (Sikh traditions), Jat Johal, Gawaria, Chamar Raigar, Bhat (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jat Mahil (Sikh traditions) (5,900), Jat Johal (400), Gawaria (88,000), Chamar Raigar (63,000), Bhat (Hindu traditions) (1,371,000)
